question: You are applying for a Job and need a reference. Write a letter to the boss in your former Job.In your letter:•	Give details of the job•	Explain why it is important to you•	Suggest what information your ex-boss could put in the reference.
text: I am writing to demand a recommendation letter that is required for the position published recently in the newspaper last week. Let me start by introducing myself, I am Alex Hammoud, and I am a civil engineer in the transportation department.

In fact, this work is very similar in terms of tasks which contain road design , the calculation for the bill of quantity and monthly sites’ inspection. Moreover, the company is located nearby my residence the downtown area where I can arrive at my workplace after five minutes walk.

The main reason for my decision is my incentive to reach higher professional standards in my future career. Furthermore, I will be able to master new engineering skills which are very compatible with the modern methods in  urban planning and traffic control.

I would suggest that you include all the classes related to engineering software and programs that I attended during all my years in your prestigious firm. In addition to that, I will be much grateful to mention my name as the employee of the month for consecutive ten times.
Your prompt action is highly appreciated.
